document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 14''' was released in November/December of 1988. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Index.Magic: :;Spells: ''[[Blindness]]'' • ''[[Confusion]]'' • ''[[Delayed blast fireball]]'' • ''[[Earthquake]]'' • ''[[Feather fall]]'' • ''[[Fireball]]'' • ''[[Fire storm]]'' • ''[[Fumble]]'' • ''[[Gust of wind]]'' • ''[[Heat metal]]'' • ''[[Jump]]'' • ''[[Magic missile]]'' • ''[[Power word, stun]]'' • ''[[Reverse gravity]]'' • ''[[Shatter]]'' • ''[[Shocking grasp]]'' • ''[[Slow]]'' • ''[[Suggestion]]'' • ''[[Tongues]]'' • ''[[Wall of fire]]''
